trans-unit.source: Defines an encoder that is used to encode [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] format images.
[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] format bitmaps support frame level thumbnails and frame level metadata.
They do not support preview, global thumbnails, global metadata, or multiple frames.
Encoding does not work in partial trust.
See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for information on partial trust.
## XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.JpegBitmapEncoder"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped horizontally during encoding.
## XAML Text Usage The horizontal flip represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the image is flipped horizontally during encoding; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped vertically during encoding.
The vertical flip represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation.
## XAML Text Usage
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the image is flipped vertically during encoding; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates the quality level of the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image.
## XAML Text Usage
The quality level of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_jpegorg](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] image.
The value range is 1 (lowest quality) to 100 (highest quality) inclusive.
Gets or sets a value that represents the degree to which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image is rotated.
Rotation is supported only in 90-degree increments.
The rotation represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation.
## XAML Text Usage
The degree to which the image is rotated.
